mapper.insert: insert into t_tickets( id, userid, lottery, money, cat_id, match_id, open_lottery, status, create_time ) values( UUID(), #{userid}, #{lottery}, #{money}, #{catId}, #{matchId}, #{openLottery}, #{status}, NOW() )
mapper.select: select * from t_tickets where id = #{id} and userid = #{userid}
